name: Space Revolution (Chazzwazzler)
description:
Space Revolution is a simple arcade-like game where you try to survive.

In this game you simply fight the unending enemy forces with lasers to protect your solar system. In this game, you try to stay alive for as long as you can and destroy as many ships and mini-bosses as you can during this time.

This game is based off of a game made by one of my friends, Kellen Sowder-Sinor.
Link for the game:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/279266353/

Also, this game is my very first video game made in something other than a block coding program. It started out as something for fun, and than became a school project too.

Use arrow keys to go up and down, space to shoot, R to restart, T to be stupid, and escape to go to the menu.
